posts.post: People who voted for Clinton in 2016 but are intending to vote for Trump in 2020 what made you change your mind?
posts.name: Matt Hardy

comments.comment: Considering that it is highly unlikely that there are many people that fall into the boat of supporting clinton then switching to trump
comments.name: Mark Henry

replies.reply: Well, the only group I can think of that fits this category are the Never Berners, assuming Sanders gets the nomination that is
replies.name: Vladimir Kudnov

replies.reply: Also I’d LOVE if Bloomberg got the nom but he won’t. So reality it is
replies.name: Mathew Wabe

posts.post: Funny how to works, isn't it?
posts.name: Rosalina Jacksaw

comments.comment: If you work in any branch of construction it makes a big difference.
comments.name: Ilham Ramdsayhh

replies.reply: I can see it being more cyclical than other industries, but try and hire a contractor right now.
replies.name: Jaren Orondu

replies.reply: Forgive me if I'm wrong, but why don't they just space the bookings throughout the year (weather permitting ofc) so they've got work all year round?
replies.name: Mohan Bhagwat

comments.comment: Because then they'd lose business to the contractor willing to do it soon instead of many months from now
comments.name: Rakesh Sharma

posts.post: ‘Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness’ Director Scott Derrickson Drops Out
posts.name: Sam Jacks

comments.comment: It seems possible considering Derrickson’s filmography
comments.name: Rajesh Malhotra

replies.reply: I really hope they realise whatever they are so afraid of isn't a big deal
replies.name: Santino Marela

replies.reply: don’t think he’ll be rehired, Gunn’s firing was a call made by a Disney exec
replies.name: C M Punk

replies.reply: In this case, Scott Derrickson and Marvel Studios mutually agreed to split
replies.name: Loren Picsum

replies.reply: There isn't going to be fan outcry. People had a lot of attachment to James Gunn's Guardians of the Galaxy, but the fanbase is not attached to Scott Derrickson
replies.name: Lorey Allena

posts.post: Army veteran has prosthetic legs repossessed after VA refuses to pay for them: 'Medicare did not send me to Vietnam'
posts.name: Yoki Kaplan Nadel

comments.comment: They say that in the Army, the pay is mighty fine
comments.name: Roshan Caleb

replies.reply: He tried to plead his case but fell a bit short.
replies.name: Allena Singh

replies.reply: They give you a hundred dollars, and take back ninety nine
replies.name: Samuel Jackson

comments.comment: He is probably out of luck as his argument doesn't have a leg to stand on.
comments.name: Dominic Martin

posts.post: Indigenous grandfather, 12-year-old girl handcuffed after trying to open bank account
posts.name: Martini

replies.reply: I’ve been working as a bank teller for years (not BMO) and calling the police for unsubstantiated fraud suspicion is completely unheard of
replies.name: Sneha Singh

replies.reply: How on earth it got to that point so quickly is beyond me...
replies.name: Anid Murmu

replies.reply: i would have thought that the typically response would be to deny them service until they cleared up the ID thing?
replies.name: Damon Salvatore

comments.comment: And i can just imagine what hassles he will get after that gets deposited...
comments.name: Joshua Marley

posts.post: If you have no problem telling a smoker their gross and it’s bad for them you should have no problem with someone telling you you’re fat and that it’s gross and bad for you.
posts.name: Bradley Cooper

comments.comment: I don't go around telling people those habits are unhealthy. They already know.
comments.name: Shanakar

replies.reply: Am fat. Can confirm
replies.name: Samsuddin sharma

replies.reply: Though being an ex smoker I’m the worst of the worst
replies.name: Neha Biswas

comments.comment: I had a 350+ guy tell me vaping caused popcorn lung. Too bad he didn't know popcorn makes him fat.
comments.name: Ehsaan

posts.post: I'm Colin O'Brady. I am the first person ever to walk across Antarctica totally alone, unsupported and completely human-powered. AMA!
posts.name: Colin O'Brady

comments.comment: How long did it take to cross?
comments.name: Manish Lamba

replies.reply: 54 days, 932 miles in total
replies.name: Colin O'Brady

comments.comment: What type of safety net did you have in case of an emergency?
comments.name: Shruti Singh

comments.comment: How much did the journey cost?
comments.name: Rohan Yadav

replies.reply: I assume, 'cold as shit'
replies.name: Nitesh Mishra

replies.reply: Get an answer for pooing, no answer for time perception. Not what I was expecting.
replies.name: Ranu Singh

posts.post: Leonardo DiCaprio's Environmental Organization Earth Alliance to Donate $3 Million for Australia Wildfire Relief
posts.name: James Hopes

comments.comment: The Australian government should be paying for this shit, not random people across the fucking world.
comments.name: Vandana Kumari

replies.reply: The only thing the Australian government would do is enforce a '$50 million climate change plan'
replies.name: Sumit Kumar

replies.reply: I read a long story about the fire fighters not being paid. A few top officers draw a salary.
replies.name: Akanchha Choudhary

comments.comment: Great to know famous people care :)
comments.name: Kanishk Sharma
